name: Qi Refinement Breakthrough Pill
desc: A pill that condenses spiritual qi to help Qi Refinement stage cultivators break through bottlenecks (effect lasts 5 years).

name: Foundation Establishment Breakthrough Pill
desc: A spiritual pill containing the true intent of Foundation Establishment to help Foundation Establishment stage cultivators break through bottlenecks (effect lasts 5 years).

name: Core Formation Breakthrough Pill
desc: Condenses the qi of Core Formation to help Core Formation stage cultivators shatter the core and form the soul (effect lasts 5 years).

name: Foundation Establishment Longevity Pill
desc: Refined from heavenly and earthly spiritual herbs
price: can extend life by ten years (limit one pill).

name: Core Formation Longevity Pill
desc: Seizes the creation of heaven and earth; mortals die instantly upon consumption
price: while Core Formation cultivators extend their life by half a cycle (limit one pill).

name: Nascent Soul Longevity Pill
desc: Contains a trace of longevity qi
price: used by Nascent Soul eccentrics to prolong life (limit one pill).

name: Qi Refinement Blood Burning Pill
desc: Burns essence blood in exchange for a short burst of power. Combat power increases within 3 years
price: but meridians are damaged and combat power decreases within 10 years.

name: Foundation Establishment Blood Burning Pill
desc: A potent medicine to stimulate potential. Combat power increases greatly within 3 years

name: Core Formation Blood Burning Pill
desc: The choice for Core Formation cultivators when fighting for their lives. Combat power surges within 3 years

name: Nascent Soul Blood Burning Pill
desc: Burns the Nascent Soul origin. Gains world-destroying power within 3 years
price: but becomes almost a cripple within 10 years.

name: Qi Refinement Rejuvenation Pill
desc: A common healing pill that can restore the injuries of Qi Refinement stage cultivators (lasts 5 years).

name: Foundation Establishment Rejuvenation Pill
desc: The medicinal power is gentle and mellow
price: able to quickly heal the physical damage of Foundation Establishment stage cultivators (lasts 5 years).

name: Core Formation Rejuvenation Pill
desc: A supreme healing medicine containing the power of vitality (lasts 5 years).

name: Nascent Soul Rejuvenation Pill
price: physical repair is extremely fast (lasts 5 years).
